resources.string: This app is News app which help to show the latest news from all over the world. This News continuously update news automatically. The All data of the news come from an News API. This website providing 200 request per day for free of cost and then it will be paid. Main Languages used inside this app is JAVA which is for Programming and XML for designing. Retrofit is used inside the application to make Network Request and GSON converter is used to convert JSON data into normal data. I Overall enjoy the whole process while making this application. Thank You.
